item.description:
Join us at Big City on Wednesday May 30th for what promises to be a great event! We are expecting 75-100 people.

Get a chance to connect with local area professionals who are passionate about what they do! Share your passions in an environment that supports connecting, mutually beneficial relationships, and team building! Not to mention it's just going to be a fun night overall :)

Did you ever think: How can your old cell phone help change a life today?

You can donate a personal electronic device in ANY condition to Jewish Big Brothers Big Sisters for refurbishment or "green-cycling."

You'll be supporting programs and services for adults with disabilities and children in our community. As an added bonus, by "green-cycling" your electronics, you keep harmful waste out of our landfills and water supplies!

Bring your old CD's, DVD's, iPods, and cell phones
to Big City in Allston on May 30th and support JBBBS!

We accept over 60,000 items in 13 categories, including...

iPhones
iPads
iPods
Cell Phone
Point and Shoot Cameras
Digital SLR Cameras
Tablets and e-Readers
Game Consoles
GPS units
Laptops
DVDs, CDs, and Blu-Rays
Video Games
Calculators

Want to learn more about Jewish Big Brothers Big Sisters? Go to www.jbbbs.org

Want to learn more about the environmental benefits of "green-cycling?" Go to http://www.causesinternational.com/

Go to http://may30th-efbevent.eventbrite.com/ to register. See you all there!
item.name: "Your Old Cell Phone Can Change a Life" Networking with JBBBS!
